icons.rank_icons: Use Geometric shapes with icons inside (e.g., Circle, Hexagon, Diamond) using pure CSS or SVG.

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode is MANDATORY. Do not support light mode toggle unless requested.
No gradients on backgrounds. Use flat colors or subtle noise textures.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings and stats. Use 'Inter' for body text.
All cards must have sharp corners (rounded-none) or very subtle rounding (rounded-sm) to fit the brutalist/gamer aesthetic.
Footer text MUST be: 'Autoral por Henrique Feldhaus â€“ Desenvolvedor Junior'
Use a Bento Grid layout for the Dashboard.
Profile Card must look like a Gamer Card (Banner at top, Avatar overlapping, Stats below).
Shop items should be displayed as cards with Rarity borders (Common=Gray, Rare=Blue, Epic=Purple, Legendary=Gold).
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE `tailwind.config.js` to include the new fonts (Barlow Condensed, Inter, JetBrains Mono) and the specific color palette defined in `colors`.
2. UPDATE `src/index.css` to import the Google Fonts and set the CSS variables for the dark theme.
3. UPDATE `src/index.css` to force dark mode by default (add `dark` class to html/body or set variables in `:root` to dark values directly).
5. When building the Profile, use the 'Gamer Card' layout: Banner image height 150px, Avatar absolute positioned -bottom-10 left-6.
6. For the Shop, create a 'RarityBadge' component that takes a rarity prop and applies the correct border color.
7. Ensure the Footer is always present at the bottom of the layout.
